issue.title: [C++] Extend Scalar Datum to support more types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4331](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4331). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Per discusssion on ARROW-47 once <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3407> is merged we should support more types (including string, possibly struct, etc)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4331?focusedCommentId=16763319) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
-0/-1. I'd prefer to address this through ARROW-47 / scalar object model. I'm going to put up an RFC patch soon for ARROW-47

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4331?focusedCommentId=16765122) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Closing in favor of patch up for ARROW-47
